mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t2.name FROM sys_user_role t1,sys_role t2 WHERE t2.role_id = t1.role_id AND t1.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT t1.permission FROM sys_resource t1, sys_role_resource t2, sys_user_role t3 WHERE t1.permission IS NOT NULL AND t1.resource_id = t2.resource_id AND t2.role_id = t3.role_id AND t3.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT t1.resource_id, t1.parent_id, t1.name, t1.url, t1.icon FROM sys_resource t1, sys_role_resource t2, sys_user_role t3 WHERE t1.resource_id = t2.resource_id AND t2.role_id = t3.role_id AND t1.type != 2 AND t3.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY order_num ASC
